title: All my PCs have lost settings/ history/ shortcuts on Firefox today.
content: Hi, we have 4 PCs (3 running Win 10 and one Win 7) which updated themselves today and lost everything. Settings, add-ons, bookmarks, shortcuts all gone; looks like a new install. I checked the other threads and the profiles; there is only one profile and no backup. How to get my stuff back?
creator: uspec

title: Yahoo mail in Firefox browser just displays symbols instead of text after installing Mac OS 13.0.1 Ventura on iMac
content:

I've been using Firefox for many years but I'm so frustrated I launched Safari this PM and Yahoo Mail opened fine. Hate to make the switch, but...

Any thoughts?

title: Firefox Constant Updates??
content: I am updated to the latest Firefox. Every time I close Firefox out and then come back, it does the whole new update spiel all over again and I have to go through it and get rid of that new little weird tab thingy. If it was a one time thing, there'd be no problem but this happens EVERY SINGLE TIME since the last update. What do I do?
creator: andiethesim
